name: Castle Defenders (Mitch)
description:
A 5 level prototype of a Tower Defence game made with Unity.

Don't let the monsters infiltrate your tower. Stop them by buying defences and upgrading them.

With 7 unique towers and 2 upgrade paths for each tower, this game is highly re playable.

Don't lose any lives to score 100% and get a gold star.

*NOTE* There is no sound
